sourcesContent:
Raza Habib

Angular Frontend Developer

99%

Client Satisfaction

The Developer

Bridging Design & Scale.

I am a 19-year-old **Angular Frontend Developer** with a sharp focus on building modern, responsive, and highly efficient web applications. Currently, I am a software engineering student at the **Virtual University of Pakistan**, where I am honing my technical foundations in BS Software Engineering.

My professional journey is centered at **Learn2Earn Tech Company**, where I specialize in the **Angular framework** to deliver clean, maintainable, and interactive user interfaces. I am not a full-stack developer—I am a dedicated frontend specialist who believes in mastered craftsmanship within the client-side ecosystem.

With less than a year of experience, I bring a fresh, rapid-learning perspective combined with a commitment to **clean code and strict type safety**. My mission is to bridge the gap between complex software requirements and intuitive, visually stunning user experiences that truly resonate with users.

Development

Engineering scalable, type-safe frontend foundations for enterprise growth.

Leadership

Mentoring teams and standardizing modern front-end best practices.
